GUI

Class game

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUI.game

  • public class game
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Alex Nour Ilya This class represents our game and contains list of packmen and fruits. also contains methods to read such objects from csv files and write to new csv files.
